com.aston.group.stationdefender.utils.resources

Class QuickSlot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aston.group.stationdefender.utils.resources.QuickSlot

  • public class QuickSlot
extends java.lang.Object
    QuickSlot class allows the player inventory to have a limited number of items and each item takes up a slot.
